summary: Frontend testing completed for SOVEH B2B retail app. All requested features verified: Customer role removed from login, AI recommendations display formatted text (not JSON), iOS 26 glassmorphism navigation working, Shop/Orders tabs functional, Admin Portal with employee code verification working correctly.
passed_tests: Login Flow - Customer role NOT shown (only Retailer, Delivery, Admin)
Retailer Dashboard - AI Recommendations display formatted bullet points (not raw JSON)
iOS 26 glassmorphism bottom navigation (blur(40px) saturate(2) effect verified)
Shop Tab - Products load correctly with 4 categories sidebar
Shop Tab - 10+ products displayed with images, prices, margin badges
Orders Tab - Empty state displays correctly
Admin Portal - Employee code verification screen with glassmorphism design
Admin Portal - Valid codes work (SOVEH001, SOVEH002, ADMIN123, SUPER001)
Admin Dashboard - Stats displayed (Total Orders, Users, Products, Revenue)
Admin Dashboard - Charts showing Orders This Week and Revenue This Week
Admin Products Tab - Product table with 10 products
Admin Products Tab - Add Product button opens modal with form fields
Admin Products Tab - View/Edit/Delete action buttons present
Admin Delivery Agents Tab - 4 agents displayed (Rajesh Kumar, Amit Singh, Suresh Patel, Vikram Yadav)
Admin Delivery Agents Tab - Status badges (available, on delivery, offline)
Admin Sidebar - All tabs present (Dashboard, Retailers, Products, Categories, Orders, Delivery Agents, Analytics, Settings)

test_credentials.otp_note: Test OTP displayed on screen after sending

context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features working correctly. Customer role removed from auth screen. AI recommendations show formatted text. Admin portal requires employee code verification before access. Delivery agents tab shows 4 mock agents with different statuses.
